properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO , USER_NAME , CS_CATEGORY_NAME , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO = NOTICE_WRITER) JOIN CS_CATEGORY USING(CS_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT NOTICE_NO , USER_NAME , CS_CATEGORY_NAME , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO = NOTICE_WRITER) JOIN CS_CATEGORY USING(CS_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND CS_CATEGORY_NO = ? ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT FAQ_NO , USER_NAME , CS_CATEGORY_NAME , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT , FAQ_ENROLL_DATE FROM FAQ JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO = FAQ_WRITER) JOIN CS_CATEGORY USING(CS_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE FAQ_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC

SELECT FAQ_NO , USER_NAME , CS_CATEGORY_NAME , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT , FAQ_ENROLL_DATE FROM FAQ JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO = FAQ_WRITER) JOIN CS_CATEGORY USING(CS_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE FAQ_STATUS = 'Y' AND CS_CATEGORY_NO = ? ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC
